ygData.subject: RE: Charisma effect on magic resists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Is it me or have the nerfed casters in general.  I play a level 17 magician and a level 22 bard and I have noticed the following occurences. 1.  My bard
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 9 Aug 1999, John Kim wrote:

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> At 120 charisma I consider the number of missed notes I get to
> be intolerable. I'd estimate I'm missing notes about 10%-20%
> of the time on low-level songs (will have to test it some time
> this week). If it's worse with lower charisma, I don't know
> how any of you are able to stand it. I worked on my enchanter
> this entire weekend because I actually get to play the game,
> instead of assidiously watching the chat window for "missed
> a note" messages. I played my bard again a couple hours
> tonight, and half the time I didn't even know what was going
> on or what song effects I had up because I was so busy trying
> to watch for and recover from missed notes. It is very
> frustrating.

Is it me or have the nerfed casters in general. I play a level 17
magician and a level 22 bard and I have noticed the following occurences.

1. My bard has been missing notes very frequently on songs from lvl3 -
lvl22. This occurs quite frequently even with the lower level songs.

2. My mage now fizzles quite frequently on her bread and butter spells.
Unlike a Wizard my mage still uses her lvl 8 shock of blades spell and
will frepuently sit down and cast summons from level 4 group of spells
(food, water and bandages). And she now suffers from numerous fizzles and
this spell has been interrupted.

Now I have talked to a wizard friend of mine and he is noticing that his
casting is now fizzling/interuppting quite frequently also. This is
leading me to believe that casters are being nerfed in some way. Has
anyone asked their caster friends if they are suffering from the same
problem?? If they are, then casters are being nerfed.

Treilanin Loreweaver 22nd level bard (almost 23 finally)
Aariel 17th level Magician (almost 18)
Honour Guard, Karana
